text_block_list.text: The day of the 'Yasuda Kinen'. Matikanetannhauser was waiting for the race to start while opening the milk pudding she had brought.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Mmm-hmm, pudding pudding pudding~ My little pudding~. It looks delicious!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Oh, come to think of it, Ikuno is also running in today's 'Yasuda Kinen', right!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I'm looking forward to it~. Maybe I'll go to the waiting room later.
(Knock knock)

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: I look forward to racing with you today, Tannhauser-san.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ikuno! Speak of the devil. Likewise, I look forward to it!

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: Yes. Let's both be careful and give it our all.

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: ...Hmm? Is that—

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Huh? What's up?

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: ...That milk pudding, by any chance, is it the one that was stored in the dormitory refrigerator?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Yeah, that's right! I saved it for today's snack.

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: Wait! If my memory serves me correctly, the expiration date should have passed five days ago!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Huh!? No way!?
In a panic, she checked the expiration date... It had indeed expired five days ago!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Whoa, I almost got a stomachache! Thanks, Ikuno!

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: Not at all. It was a coincidence, but I'm glad I came to say hello.

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: It would be a problem if an important rival collapsed before the race.

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: That's right. Just to be safe, let's also check the condition of your horseshoes.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I, Ikuno, you're so kind...!
